content: these mitts are worked in the round with no shaping the shell pattern is stretchy and will accommodate the shape of your hand beautifully all you need to do is remember to add your peek-a-boo hole for the thumb are you up for the challenge can you make a pair of these mitts in less than one hour i can complete the short ones darning ends and everything in that time but the long mitts take me about one hour and ten minutes try them for yourself and see…
